author: USA TODAY, Jeff Zillgitt, USA TODAY
title: Former NBA player Jason Collins tests positive for coronavirus
description: Former NBA player Jason Collins tested positive for the novel coronavirus. He believes he caught COVID-19 while at Barclays Center.
content:
USA TODAY Sports' Mark Medina breaks down how NBA players are dealing with the stoppage in play due to COVID-19.
USA TODAY
Former NBA player Jason Collins tested positive for the novel coronavirus, he said on Twitter Tuesday.
